DemolitionistSpecialText.AfterDD2Start: I don't see why we can't just blow up those portals.
DemolitionistSpecialText.Graveyard1: The stench of death here is worse than the skeleton-infested caverns where I work!
DemolitionistSpecialText.Graveyard2: All these piles of bones and stones... perfect for blowin' up!
DemolitionistSpecialText.Party: You might want to be careful today. Us dwarves tend to have pretty explosive parties.
DemolitionistSpecialText.Rain1: This is a terrible day to be a dwarf.
DemolitionistSpecialText.Rain2: ARGH! Another fuse put out by all this wet stuff! This never happens underground!
DemolitionistSpecialText.Storm1: BOOM! Even mother nature likes a taste of gratifying demolition!
DemolitionistSpecialText.Storm2: You shoulda seen it when lightning struck one of my carts filled with explosives!
DemolitionistSpecialText.Windy1: Now might not be the best time to lob grenades on the surface, my tall friend!
DemolitionistSpecialText.Windy2: You want boomerang bombs? Throw some out in that gust, they'll come back to you alright!

TownNPCMood_Demolitionist.Content: Well, I don't feel like exploding today!
TownNPCMood_Demolitionist.DislikeBiome: I can't stand {BiomeName}, my fuses have trouble igniting here!
TownNPCMood_Demolitionist.DislikeCrowded: I dislike the number of people here, for safety reasons, of course...
TownNPCMood_Demolitionist.DislikeNPC: I wanna strap {NPCName} to a rocket and watch what happens!
TownNPCMood_Demolitionist.FarFromHome: I need more BOOM, I think I left it way back at home.
TownNPCMood_Demolitionist.HateBiome: It reeks of death and malice in {BiomeName}, I wanna blasts holes everywhere!
TownNPCMood_Demolitionist.HateCrowded: Too many people around! One mistake making dynamite, and... well, they'd HATE the outcome!
TownNPCMood_Demolitionist.LikeBiome: Dwarves are naturally drawn to {BiomeName}, it's in our blood!
TownNPCMood_Demolitionist.LikeNPC: {NPCName} is a good friend I like, helps me load the gunpowder!
TownNPCMood_Demolitionist.LikeNPC_Princess: WHAT... {NPCName}? Is that a new brand of nitro? Oh, HER, Yes, good lass!
TownNPCMood_Demolitionist.LoveNPC: I love how well {NPCName} can handle a container of fireball!
TownNPCMood_Demolitionist.LoveSpace: Ah, no one around - I can test new bombs without creating a graveyard for limbs!
TownNPCMood_Demolitionist.NoHome: I don't have a place to live, did I blow up my last one?
